jobs_results.title: Software Engineer (Android)
jobs_results.description:
Software Engineer (Android)

Date posted 03/14/ Location Gothenburg | Sweden Company Worldline

Software Engineer (Android)

Worldline v√§xer och beh√∂ver st√§rka utvecklingsavdelningen i Halmstad med ytterligare Android-utvecklare som kan bidra med b√•de kompetens, erfarenhet och en h√§rlig personlighet. Vi s√∂ker dig som har ett genuint teknikintresse och som tycker om att arbeta tillsammans med andra utvecklare i sann laganda.

I v√•ra moderna och rymliga lokaler i Halmstad arbetar ett 60-tal h√§rliga Worldliners i blandad √•lder inom flera olika arbetsomr√•den. Produktutvecklingsteamet utg√∂rs av ca 20 personer och det √§r h√§r vi tar fram Worldlines produkter riktade till sm√•- och medelstora butikshandlare fr√§mst i Norden, fr√•n kortterminaler och betalsystem, till kundinriktade och interna webbsystem, verktyg och API-er. V√•ra betaltj√§nster anv√§nds av tiotusentals butikshandlare som tillsammans genomf√∂r miljontals transaktioner varje dag, √•ret runt.

Nu siktar vi √§nnu h√∂gre och planerar att ta v√•ra produkter och tj√§nster ut till sm√•- och medelstora handlare i hela Europa. Worldline har redan idag en mycket v√§l etablerad verksamhet runt om i Europa f√∂r en m√§ngd olika kundsegment, framf√∂r allt storkunder och banker, s√• v√•ra produkter som vi ansvarar f√∂r kompletterar Worldlines portf√∂lj v√§ldigt v√§l.

Vi erbjuder en flexibel hybridmodell d√§r man har goda m√∂jligheter att arbeta b√•de p√• plats och p√• distans. Vi tror dock p√• samh√∂righet och teamk√§nsla, d√§rf√∂r erbjuds inte denna tj√§nst helt p√• distans.

Arbetsbeskrivning

Du kommer vara en del av ett erfaret utvecklingsteam som fokuserar p√• att utveckla v√•ra kortterminaler. En ny generation Android-baserade kortterminaler h√•ller p√• att utvecklas och dessa kommer √∂ver tid ers√§tta √§ldre generationer. H√§r har du en fantastisk m√∂jlighet att vara med fr√•n tidigt stadie i ett sp√§nnande arbete d√§r ny teknik skapar nya m√∂jligheter f√∂r oss och v√•ra kunder.

Vi arbetar agilt och produktdrivet med flera autonoma team, d√§r vi str√§var efter bred kompetens s√• att alla kan bidra med det som beh√∂vs. Vi tror att kommunikation och samarbete inom teamet s√•v√§l som med andra team √§r nyckeln till framg√•ng. Vi njuter av en √∂ppen, hj√§lpsam och positiv atmosf√§r.

Teamet arbetar i en bred teknikstack, d√§r Android och Kotlin √§nd√• st√•r i fokus, och vi str√§var alltid efter att l√§ra oss nya saker och utmana oss sj√§lva f√∂r att alltid kunna leverera b√§ttre och modernare produkter och tj√§nster till v√•ra kunder.

Alla team har fullst√§ndigt tekniskt √§garskap f√∂r flera system d√§r man gemensamt och i sann DevOps-anda ansvarar f√∂r alla delar s√• som kravst√§llning, arkitektur, teknikval, utveckling, test, CI/CD och lansering.Tillsammans med v√•ra produkt√§gare formar ni v√•ra produkter f√∂r dagens och framtidens behov.

Egenskaper

‚Ä¢ Du brinner f√∂r att l√§ra dig nya saker och h√•ller dig uppdaterad inom moderna utvecklingsramverk och metodologier
‚Ä¢ Du √§r lyh√∂rd, vill l√§ra och delar g√§rna med dig av din kompetens med andra
‚Ä¢ Du √§r en sann lagspelare med en positiv, √∂dmjuk inst√§llning

Kvalifikationer

‚Ä¢ Erfarenhet inom testautomation

Meriterande

‚Ä¢ Kompetens inom n√•gra av dessa teknologier vi arbetar med dagligenC# .NET, C/C++, SQLite, MariaDB, Elasticsearch, Grafana, Docker, Swagger, GitLab, TeamCity, Octopus Deploy

Skicka in din jobbans√∂kan och CV s√• snart som m√∂jligt d√• vi granskar ans√∂kningar l√∂pande. Vi ser fram emot att h√∂ra mer om dig och dina passioner och f√§rdigheter!

jobs_results.title: Mobile Engineer
jobs_results.description:
Company Description

Wolt is a technology company that makes it incredibly easy to discover and get the best restaurants, grocery stores and other local shops delivered to your home or office. Since launching 8 years ago, Wolt has expanded from a restaurant food delivery platform in the Nordics to a leading player in the delivery of everything across EMEA. Wolt works together with tens of thousands of restaurant and retail partners, as well as with over a hundred thousand courier partners across 23 countries and 250+ cities.

In November 2021, we announced that we‚Äôre joining forces with the US-based company DoorDash. The transaction closed in May 2022, and since then we have been one team with DoorDash. Our CEO, Miki Kuusi leads all of DoorDash‚Äôs international business in the 26 countries outside of the US.

Wolt not only offers great apps to customers and partners, but is also developing a broad range of technologies and solutions. Our apps (iOS and Android) have the industry‚Äôs highest reviews, largely because of our customer-centric approach to how we build our products and operations. For example, our customer service team responds in a matter of minutes, in the customer‚Äôs own language.

So, why work at Wolt?

At Wolt, we‚Äôre about getting things done.

You‚Äôll probably enjoy it here if you like taking ownership, developing yourself and being around friendly, humble and ambitious people.

We work hard to make cities into better places, and it‚Äôs pretty cool seeing us grow every week. If you‚Äôre passionate about building things that just‚Ä¶ work, Wolt might be for you.

Our Commitment to Diversity, Equity & Inclusion

We want to have all sorts of people in our team ‚Äì people like you and me, and people different from you and me. To be able to work with diverse teammates ‚Äì when it comes to gender, age, ethnicity, life background, sexual orientation, political views, religion, or any other personal trait ‚Äì we consciously aim to offer equal opportunity for everyone to work with us. This is because we believe diverse teams make the most thought-through decisions and build things in the most inclusive way.

Join us today to build Wolt together.
Job Description

Be part of an ambitious new initiative that will redefine how our merchants operate across both physical and virtual worlds. As an early contributor, you‚Äôll play a pivotal role in designing and building a modern Android app that leverages existing technology assets while also creating new, innovative features. You‚Äôll have the opportunity to work with cutting-edge tools and frameworks, balancing the need for new development with the practicalities of integrating with established systems.

You‚Äôll enjoy a high level of autonomy, influencing architecture, technology choices, and product direction. This is more than just coding‚Äîit's about solving complex challenges and crafting a seamless experience for merchants, redefining their daily operations. You‚Äôll need to be comfortable working with what‚Äôs already in place, as well as identifying where you can introduce new, forward-looking solutions.

Your role will require an ability to handle ambiguity and rapid changes while maintaining a focus on quality and high performance. This is a unique opportunity to work on a new product that will significantly impact how merchants operate.

Key Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Architect and build key components of a modern Android application, leveraging both existing technology assets and new tools.
‚Ä¢ Influence architecture decisions, technology stack selection, and product direction.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate closely with product, design and backend teams to shape features and user experiences.
‚Ä¢ Implement high-quality, scalable code while maintaining performance and security standards.
‚Ä¢ Rapidly iterate and adapt to evolving requirements and ambiguous contexts.
‚Ä¢ Continuously refine the app‚Äôs user experience to support and enhance merchants‚Äô daily operations.
‚Ä¢ Drive innovation and help establish best practices for the team.
‚Ä¢ Mentor and coach junior engineers, fostering a collaborative and inclusive environment.

üìçThis role can be based in one of our tech hubs in Helsinki, Stockholm or Tallinn.
Qualifications
‚Ä¢ Android development experience, with a solid grasp of Kotlin and the Android SDK.
‚Ä¢ Hands-on experience with Jetpack Compose and modern Android app architectures (e.g., MVVM, MVI).
‚Ä¢ Experience with UI/UX principles, including building polished, accessible interfaces aligned with Design guidelines.
‚Ä¢ A demonstrated track record of working in a fast-paced environment with changing requirements.
‚Ä¢ Ability to work independently, make decisions with a high degree of autonomy, and handle ambiguity effectively.
‚Ä¢ Effective collaboration and communication skills to work seamlessly with team members and stakeholders.

Nice-to-Haves:
‚Ä¢ Interest or foundational experience in Golang or Kotlin backend development.
‚Ä¢ Exposure to Flutter framework to bring fresh perspectives to the mobile development process.
‚Ä¢ Willingness and ability to travel to the US for in-person team collaboration.
‚Ä¢ Previous experience in start-up environments or working on early-stage products, demonstrating adaptability and entrepreneurial mindset.

Additional Information

jobs_results.title: Mobilutvecklare
jobs_results.description:
Techster Solutions befinner i dagsl√§get sig i en sp√§nnande tillv√§xtfas och s√∂ker nu fler kollegor, inledningsvis dig med minst 3+ √•rs erfarenhet och som kan st√§rka teamet.

Du kan f√∂rv√§nta dig en omv√§xlande milj√∂, dagarna kan se v√§ldigt olika ut - men en sak √§r s√§kert, h√§r f√•r du anv√§nda dina kompetenser och s√§tter sj√§lv gr√§nsen f√∂r hur mycket du vill utvecklas. Som ett kunskapsbolag √§r det viktigt f√∂r oss att v√•ra specialister delar med sig av sin kompetens och f√•r kollegorna att v√§xa.

Rollbeskrivning:

You will join a team of highly skilled developers with an established network within the company software community. We cooperate closely with for example UX/Design, the Product Owner and tech leads. The position is based in Lund.

Who are you?You are a very skilled software developer and you have worked with AOSP, the Android framework, SystemUI and Java/Kotlin app development. Quality thinking and taking ownership are parts of your characteristics and you naturally write testable and maintainable code. You are a true collaborator who feel comfortable handling complexity. You are used to working in cross functional teams where collaboration with for example interaction and graphic designers is a part of the day-to-day work.

What you need to bring with you?‚Ä¢ M.Sc in Software Engineering or corresponding relevant experience‚Ä¢ Java/Kotlin app development‚Ä¢ Experience in working within AOSP and Android Framework‚Ä¢ Experience in Android stack and related development and build tools (Gradle and Soong build system)‚Ä¢ Writing automated unit and integration tests as a natural part of design and implementation‚Ä¢ Comfortable working in a Linux environment‚Ä¢ Experience in working with Git/Gerrit/Jenkins tools‚Ä¢ Good communication skills, including in English (written and spoken)‚Ä¢ Swedish Driver's license (B-level) is required to be able to do testing in cars

It is meritorious if you have experience of:‚Ä¢ AIDL and Android HAL‚Ä¢ C++ development‚Ä¢ Experience from Android SystemUI

Ans√∂kan Tror du att du √§r Techster Solutions n√§sta stj√§rna? Tveka d√• inte att skicka in din ans√∂kan redan nu. Urval sker l√∂pande och tilltr√§de sker enligt √∂verenskommelse.

Arbetsplats och kulturVi √§r ett entrepren√∂rdrivet IT f√∂retag, med b√•de produktkunskap och f√∂rs√§ljning (Techster AB) och konsultativa tj√§nster (Techster Solutions AB). Det inneb√§r att vi √§r mycket √∂ppna f√∂r nya tekniska l√∂sningar, kunskapsutbyte och st√§ndigt l√§rande. Att ha roligt och samtidigt beh√•lla den familj√§ra andan utan hierarkier √§r lika viktigt.

Vi vill skapa det konsultbolag som du alltid velat jobba f√∂r, men kanske inte hittat √§nnu. Redan idag har vi en blandning av seniora och yngre medarbetare, s√•v√§l som m√§n och kvinnor. Det vill vi forts√§tta att bygga p√•. S√• v√§lkommen med din ans√∂kan!

jobs_results.title: Android Software Engineer with Backend Expertise
jobs_results.description:
This is Readly
Readly offers unlimited access to thousands of national and international magazines and newspapers, all in one app. We‚Äôve partnered with 1,200+ world-famous publishers, providing readers with 7,500+ titles and over 290,000 back issues.

We‚Äôre a value-driven ecosystem committed to unlocking a world of editorial content. Our goal is to boost journalistic content consumption through an innovative digital product while minimizing our climate impact. With a dedicated team of 100+ professionals in Sweden, Germany, and the UK, we‚Äôre making magazines and trusted journalism more accessible than ever.

Android Software Engineer with Backend Expertise

We are seeking Android engineers to join our mission of delivering world-class magazine apps on Android, iOS, and Web.

As part of a lean, flat tech organization, you'll contribute to both product features and the evolution of our Android tech stack. Working in autonomous, cross-functional teams, you'll be involved in the entire product development process, from idea to deployment.

We value curiosity, collaboration, and a passion for development. In addition to Android expertise, backend knowledge‚Äîpreferably in Node.js‚Äîis essential to support full-stack features and smooth front-end/back-end integration. Join us in a skilled and dedicated team at a market-leading company.

What you will do
‚Ä¢ Collaborate in a small autonomous team of developers, designers, and a product manager in our mission to continue to provide a best-in-world Android magazine application to the market.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with other Android developers to jointly shape the direction of our Android tech stack and development processes.
‚Ä¢ Leverage your backend knowledge, preferably in Node.js, to work on full-stack features and enhance the overall functionality of our applications.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with developers across other stacks to shape the direction of our complete tech stack portfolio.
‚Ä¢ Manage releases in various app stores.
‚Ä¢ Assure code quality through code reviews.
‚Ä¢ Learn a ton of new things and share your knowledge with colleagues.
‚Ä¢ Have fun and take a lot of pride in what you and all of Readly are doing.

What we are looking for
‚Ä¢ Ideally, you have 5+ years of professional experience in software development, including 3+ years of Android app development.
‚Ä¢ You have a strong understanding of modern Android development, mobile architecture patterns, and experience with modern Android development tools.
‚Ä¢ You know how to write readable, maintainable, and performant code and care about quality in your work.
‚Ä¢ You possess backend development experience, preferably with Node.js, to support the integration and functionality of our applications.
‚Ä¢ You‚Äôre excellent in problem solving and debugging code.
‚Ä¢ Experience working in Agile/Scrum/Kanban-oriented team environments.

Who you are
‚Ä¢ You are passionate about building great products that people love.
‚Ä¢ You have a ‚Äúcan-do mentality,‚Äù but you are not afraid to ask questions and seek assistance from colleagues.
‚Ä¢ You value teamwork and collaborative problem-solving, demonstrating good communication skills, empathy, and a team-first mindset.
‚Ä¢ Culture fit ‚Äì You embody our culture of bravery, humility, and transparency and are passionate about helping us achieve our goals. You understand the importance of curiosity, empower others, and build on a foundation of trust by sharing information openly and proactively.

Application

Do you feel this is a perfect match? Please apply by clicking the link below!

Readly has been listed on the Allbright list three years in a row for having a gender-balanced management team. Additionally, we are very proud to have a 50/50 gender split among our employees and managers. Maintaining this balance is important to us.

As many other digital companies acknowledge, tackling the gender gap in the product and tech industry is challenging. We actively encourage women to apply for this position.

Ready to make an impact? Apply to join Readly and be part of a team where your work truly matters.

jobs_results.title: Android Software Engineer
jobs_results.description:
About ECARX

ECARX (Nasdaq: ECX) is a global mobility-tech company that partners with leading Original Equipment Manufacturers (OEMs) to reshape the automotive industry as it transitions toward an all-electric future. With innovative technology such as central computers, System-on-a-Chip (SoCs), and software solutions, ECARX is driving the next generation of in-car user experiences. Since its founding in 2017, ECARX has grown to nearly 2,000 employees, and its products have been integrated into over 5 million vehicles worldwide.

About the Role

We are seeking an Android Software Engineer to join our team developing a cutting-edge digital cockpit product, from silicon to pixels, for world-leading vehicle manufacturers. You will work on Android Automotive Operating System (AAOS) and the Android Open Source Project (AOSP) to create applications and frameworks that enhance the in-car user experience. As part of a young and dynamic company, you will have the opportunity to shape both our products and company culture, working in an environment that values initiative, collaboration, and creativity.

What You Will Do
‚Ä¢ Develop native platform software for AOSP using the Soong/Make build system, with a focus on high-quality code and user experience.
‚Ä¢ Work on Android app development using Kotlin and Java to build innovative automotive solutions.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with global teams to define and develop new features, troubleshoot issues, and optimize performance.
‚Ä¢ Contribute to improving the Android software development processes and toolchains.
‚Ä¢ Participate in code reviews, ensuring that all code is efficient, maintainable, and testable.
‚Ä¢ Apply your knowledge of core Android components such as Activities, Services, Content Providers, Broadcast Receivers, and Intents to develop robust applications.

What You Need
‚Ä¢ A BSc in Computer Science or equivalent experience in software development.
‚Ä¢ 5+ years of industry experience, preferably with a background in the automotive or infotainment industry.
‚Ä¢ Expertise in Android app development using Kotlin and Java, with proficiency in Android Studio.
‚Ä¢ Hands-on experience in native platform development for AOSP using the Soong/Make build system.
‚Ä¢ Deep understanding of the Android SDK and its core components.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of Android runtime resource overlays (RRO), privileged apps, and permissions is a plus.
‚Ä¢ Experience with automotive communication protocols and QNX is an advantage.
‚Ä¢ Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently and in a fast-paced environment.

Why Choose ECARX?

You will work with talented colleagues in an international and open environment, developing the next generation of in-car experiences. Located in the state-of-the-art Uni3 campus in Lindholmen, you‚Äôll enjoy scenic views of the harbor and exciting new technology projects. We offer a hybrid remote workday, promoting a healthy work-life balance, competitive salaries, and a strong commitment to diversity, which makes ECARX an awesome place to work!

What We Offer
‚Ä¢ A collaborative and creative work environment, focused on personal and professional growth.
‚Ä¢ Opportunities to work on cutting-edge technology and shape the future of in-car experiences.
‚Ä¢ A competitive salary and a hybrid remote work arrangement.
‚Ä¢ A modern office with great amenities and an on-site restaurant featuring Asian fusion flavors.

jobs_results.title: Software Engineer, Google Meet Interoperability/Rooms Media, Android
jobs_results.description: Mid-level Software Engineer position at Google, focusing on Android development for Google Meet Interoperability and Rooms Media systems in Stockholm.

jobs_results.title: Android Developer / CTS Expert
jobs_results.description:
Project description

Our new Android Automotive IVI project is looking for an Expert Automotive HAL Developer for an agile project development team. It is an ongoing development project for one of our OEM customers, featuring state of the art and innovative functionalities and technologies.

Our team: Global team of professionals in the automotive industry with experience in innovative development.

Responsibilities
‚Ä¢ Work inside an intercultural team of many layers and competencies around software engineering, architecture, and development.
‚Ä¢ Primarily responsible for analysing results of Google's CTS tests.
‚Ä¢ Identify any issues that impact the successful execution of CTS.

SKILLS

Must have
‚Ä¢ Deep expertise in Google CTS tests.
‚Ä¢ Strong Android skills - 5+ years experience.
‚Ä¢ Strong C++ skills - 5+ years experience.
‚Ä¢ Strong Java skills - 5+ years experience.
‚Ä¢ Experience working with Git.

Nice to have
‚Ä¢ Docker
‚Ä¢ AUTOSAR (AUTomotive Open System ARchitecture)
‚Ä¢ Linux
‚Ä¢ Gerrit
‚Ä¢ GitHub
‚Ä¢ AOSP
‚Ä¢ Atlassian Confluence
‚Ä¢ Atlassian Jira
